=== Summary ===
Ubuntu linux meeting, Gutsy release party and demonstration

=== Goals ===
* Talk about and look at the new Ubuntu version: Gutsy Gibbon 7.10
* Meet and greet with computer enthusiasts and members of the Ubuntu community.
* Have a good time.

=== When? Where? ===
* Date: Wednesday October 24 2007
* Time: 19.00 Hr
* Place: Brasserie Damier, Stationsplein 13,8800 Roeselare
* <nowiki>[[http://users.pandora.be/wybo/linuxbabbel/|Original message in dutch]]</nowiki>

=== How to get there ? ===
see <nowiki>[[http://maps.google.be/maps?f=q&hl=nl&q=Stationsplein+13,+Roeselare+8800+Roeselare,+West-Vlaanderen,+Vlaams+Gewest,+Belgi%C3%AB&sll=50.909961,4.42749&sspn=3.04821,10.283203&ie=UTF8&cd=1&geocode=0,50.948506,3.129893&ll=50.955021,3.134108&spn=0.011896,0.040169&z=14&om=1&source=embed|Google map]]</nowiki> of the location.

*** with car: parking near the station.
*** with bus: bus stop within 50 meters range. buses from Brugge, Ieper, Kortrijk, Diksmuide, Menen.
*** with train: station within 80 meters from the perron to the meeting.  trains from Kortrijk and Brugge

=== Info ===
* Free entrance, pay your own drinks
* Bring your laptop !

=== Contact Information ===
* <nowiki>[[mailto:gtimp@scarlet.be|Georges]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[mailto:koen.wybo@telenet.be|Koen]]</nowiki>
